entry.title: Tuesday: Snow. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning early this morning. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind becoming east 30 km/h gusting to 50 this morning. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 25 this morning and minus 9 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Tuesday 28 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: Snow ending before morning then cloudy. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 15 this evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Tuesday 28 February 2023
